description: Installation of a metal fire escape staircase to the rear of the building to provide emergency access from the first floor dorms to the yard
subdivision_of_building: West wing of the main fire station building.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s),

Design and Access Statement by Frankham dated October 2023, Heritage Statement by Frankham dated October 20232, 28635-FCG-ST-XX-DR-B-1000 Site Location & Block Plans S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-00-DR-B-2000 Existing Ground Floor Plan S4-P04, 228635-FCG-MB-00-DR-B-2001 Existing First Floor Plan S4-P04, 228635-FCG-MB-00-DR-B-2002 Proposed Ground Floor Plan S4-P05, 228635-FCG-MB-00-DR-B-2003 Proposed First Floor Plan S4-P05, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2200 Existing Front (South) Elevation S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2201 Existing Side (West) Elevation S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2202 Existing Rear (North) Elevation S4-P02,  228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2203 Existing Side (East) Elevation S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2204 Proposed Front (South) Elevation S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2205 Proposed Side (West) Elevation S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2206 Proposed Rear (North) Elevation S4-P02, 228635-FCG-MB-EL-DR-B-2207 Proposed Side (East) Elevation S4-P02,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
